section.p: The sections below describe the metrics supported by :

ul.li: Standard metrics for general monitoring of servers and networks.
Additional metrics for monitoring specific servers and services.

section.p: For you as the OpenStack operator, the following metrics are of relevance for monitoring the servers and services of your OpenStack platform:

li.p: The following additional metrics: apache, crash, host_alive, http_check, http_metrics, libvirt, mysql, ntp, ovs, postfix, process, rabbitmq.

The Metrics Agent can also run Nagios plugins and send status codes returned by the plugins as metrics to the Monitoring API. For information on how to use Nagios checks in , contact your FUJITSU support organization.

note.p: Adding dimensions for metrics is not supported by . The installer auto-detects applications and processes that are running on your machine and saves the corresponding settings to the agent's configuration file. Additional dimensions cannot be specified.
